PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-01632009-02-05ND,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES to ensure that the QR&O more accurately reflect the Governor in Council's authority under subsection 20(2) of the National Defence Act and provide military authorities with the necessary flexibility to respond to the needs of the Canadian Forces. A minor amendment would also be made to provide consistency between the French and English versions.
